Uses of Package
control

  • Packages that use control 
    Package Description
    control  
    gui.Board  
  • Classes in control used by control 
    Class and Description
    AiControl
    A class to control the computer-players of the game with references to parts of the program the method needs.
    BoardHandler
    Interface for the class that controls the board.
    DeckHandler
    Interface to control the deck.
    PlayerHandler
    Interface to control and create players.
    PlayerMoves
    Interface for the players moves.
    PointCounter
    A class to calculate points of moves and at the end of the deck.
  • Classes in control used by gui.Board 
    Class and Description
    GameCreator
    A class to create the game and all the controllers needed for the game to function.
